最酷的技能學習平台<br/>從寫程式到 B-box 你都可以在這裡教與學！<br:
A fancy learning platform.
You can learn and teach anything here.
Variety range from programming to B-box...
上課三步驟: How to start taking a course?
註冊帳號後，進入「搜尋課程」頁面選擇你要學習的領域，將會立即出現該領域的所有課程: After become a member, go to search a course that you are interested, you can also search with different categories.
挑好課程後，可點選行事曆的時段選擇上課時間，並進入「購物車」中確認購買，完成購買: After choose a course, pick one of the available time and confirm to deduct the points in the shopping cart. If you are out of the points, you should go to charge your account first.
課程開始前至「我的行事曆」點選上課時段，可見上課的視訊連結。上課時間進入指定的視: Check the course information from My Calendar. Visit the course link when your course is about to start and be ready to enjoy the course with the teacher.
上架你的才華，將熱情與技能分享給全世界: Upload your talent, share your passion and skill to the world!
您已成功成為老師囉！: You are login as a teacher already.
註冊一個老師身分的帳號，即可成為老師囉！按下確定將帶您前往註冊頁面。: Register a teacher account to become a teacher, click OK to go to register page.
網站更新中請稍後再登入: Website is updating, please login later
恭喜成為新會員，您將獲得免費的上課點數 1000 點！: Welcome to this website, you will receive 1000 free points
發生了一點錯誤，請稍後再試: Something went wrong, please try again later!
目前尚未有領域開放查詢，請稍後再試: No category available, please try again later!
目前尚未有課程上架，請稍後再試: No course available, please try again later!
Oops！目前此領域課程尚未上架，先逛逛其他領域吧 ~: Oops, no course in this category yet, check out another category.
No courses in shopping cart yet.
課程時段重複了，請擇一購買喔！: Time overlapped, please choose one of the courses.
確認從購物車刪除此課程嗎？: Do you want to delete the course?
尚未選擇要確認購買的課程: No course to confirm the payment
剩餘點數不足，請先去儲值點數喔！: Your are out of the points, please charge account before you confirm the payment.
按下確認購買後，將會於您的帳戶扣除點數: After click the confirm button, the points will be deducted from your account.
成功扣點！可在行事曆上看到已購買成功的課程喔: Success deducted points! You can check your course from your calendar.
老師臨時無法上課，因此取消了此堂課程，系統已經自動將點數退還給你囉！: The teacher cancel this course, we have return you points back.
確認要取消這堂課嗎？: Do you want to cancel this course?
目前無法取消課程，請稍後再試: Fail to cancel the course record, please try again later.
課程取消成功！我們已經將此堂課的課程點數退還給你囉！: Cancel this course successfully! We have returned you the points from the course.
確認要刪除這筆課程紀錄嗎？: Do you want to delete the course record?
目前無法刪除這筆課程紀錄，請稍後再試: Fail to delete the course record, please try again later.
確定取消此時段的課程嗎？系統將通知預約的學生您已取消這堂課！: Do you want to cancel the course? We will inform the reserved student you have canceled the course.
確定刪除此時段的課程嗎？: Do you want to delete the course?
尚有欄位未填寫！: Please fill in the empty input
尚有欄位未填寫，且 Contact Email 格式錯誤！: Please fill in the empty input, and contact email format is invalid
一切都 OK！發布至前台: Everything is ready, publish the course to public
還有資訊需要編輯，暫時不發布: Still preparing the course, don't publish it yet
溫馨提醒：加入購物車不代表預約成功，請至購物車完成扣點手續，我們才能幫你保留這堂: Reminder: Before you confirm the payment in shopping cart, the course is still available for others.
加入成功！請至購物車結帳吧！: Add successfully, please go to the shopping cart and confirm the payment.
學生身份才能使用課程預約功能！請以學生身份登入系統再試一次。: Only student can make a reservation, please access as a student account.
尚有欄位未填答，請填寫完後再送出資料: Fill in the blank before you submit.
確定要將課程資訊上架到前台嗎？(上架到前台後，任何人都可以瀏覽你的課程頁面，並可: Do you want to publish your course to the public? If so, everyone can see your course and make a reservation.
確定要將課程資訊暫時隱藏嗎？(從前台隱藏後，其他人將無法瀏覽你的課程頁面，也無法: Do you want to hide your course temporary? If so, your course will be invisible in public, and no one can make a reservation for the course.
確定刪除這門課嗎？刪除後的課程資訊將不可回復！: Do you want to delete the course? Once you delete it, the course information wil not return.
課程已通過審核，設定完課程時段後同學們就可以預約囉！: The course is passed the evaluation, please set up the course time for student make a reservation.
課程審核中，審核成功後將以電子郵件通知您: The course is under evaluation, once it finished we will inform you the result by email.
課程未通過審核，請調整課程資訊後再重新送審: The course failed the evaluation, please adjust the content and submit again
為避免資料遺失，編輯完成的課程資料要記得送審喔！: To avoid lose your data, please submit your course for evaluation after you edit the course information.
前往此門課程的前台頁面: Go to the course front page
你好像還沒有開設課程～點選上方的下拉式選單新增你的第一堂課吧！: You have no course yet, click the create button above to start your first course.
此方案大概可以上: With this plan you can have around
請用此測試信用卡號結帳: Please confirm the payment with this credit card number.
注意！結帳時請使用下方測試信用卡資料，請勿輸入您真實的信用卡號: Warning! Please confirm the payment with credit card information below. Don't enter your real credit card information.
一元兌換 1 point，儲值額度不得低於 100: $1 for 1 point, the minimum price is $100
